cancellationPolicies.label: Deposit Only rates
cancellationPolicies.description: This property has a 3 day cancellation policy. Failure to cancel within this time will result in a cancellation charge equal to the first night of your stay, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information).

cancellationPolicies.label: Non-refundable rates
cancellationPolicies.description: Your booking is non-refundable. If you choose to cancel your booking, or in the case of a no-show, you will still be charged the full cost of your booking.

dorms.name: Basic 10 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription:
Budget bunk room, with sheet and pillow supplied. Linen included on request.
PLEASE NOTE: This room has skylights only (no opening window) but does have controlled air conditioning.

paymentProcedure.label: Non-refundable
paymentProcedure.description:
Non-refundable
Your booking is non-refundable. The property will charge you the full amount at any time after your booking confirmation, even if you cancel or don’t show up.

rateRuleViolationsMessages.description: Requires a minimum of 2 nights stay on your dates

dorms.labelDescription: 8 bed bunk room with sheet and pillow supplied. Duvets and towels available for hire, fans and hot water bottles on request.

privates.name: Standard Twin Room Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: 2 single mattresses with linen, fresh towels, a vanity area with a sink, heater, fan and hot water bottles available on request. As well as the communual bathrooms, you will have access to a shared private bathroom.

privates.labelDescription: High quality double bed and linen, fresh towels, a vanity area with a sink. Heater for your comfort in winter - fans, hot water bottles available on request. As well as the communal bathrooms, you will have access to a shared private bathroom.

freeCancellation.label: Free Cancellation rates
freeCancellation.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 24th Dec 2025 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 24th Dec 2025 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.
